description: Domon Kasshu`s childhood friend, who now serves as his support crew during the 13th Gundam Fight. A former medical student, Rain was recalled to the space colony of Neo Japan to assist her old friend in the tournament. This multitalented woman is both a trained medic and a skilled engineer, and in case of emergency she can even pilot a mobile fighter into battle. Rain is brave, friendly, and unfailingly loyal, but despite her generous temperament she often finds it difficult to deal with the stubborn Domon.
name: Rain Mikamura
